install.name: jNews Tag: Site Links
install.author: Joobi Limited
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2012 Joobi Limited All rights reserved
install.description: This plugin enables you to add "view it online link" to the newsletter and custom site links.

param.name: viewtemplate
param.label: Display the online version
param.description: Select if you want to display the online version (when the user clicks on the view it online link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: customlink
param.label: Custom Links
param.description: Enter the custom site link tags here with the format sitename|url. Ex. ijoobi|www.joobi.co
